events.message: I am filing a claim due to a recent car accident that caused significant damage to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the details of the vehicle collision submitted.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage your auto accident claim and assist you throughout the process.
Your claim has been acknowledged and is now officially in our system for further processing.
Please provide the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents related to the vehicle collision have been submitted successfully for review.
The investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident and damage is currently underway.
The investigation has been completed with findings confirming the extent of the vehicle damage caused by the accident.
Based on the investigation, a settlement amount has been proposed to cover repairs for the damaged vehicle.
The customer has reviewed the settlement proposal and provided positive feedback on the timely processing.
The auto accident claim has been approved and the settlement amount is ready to be disbursed.
Payment for the approved claim has been issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover vehicle repair costs.
The claim has been successfully closed following payment distribution and confirmation of repair completion.
The auto accident claim case has been archived for future reference and record keeping purposes.
